content.html: The Croatan were a small Native American ethnic group living in the coastal areas of what is now North Carolina. Governor John White returned to Roanoke in 1590 to find the word "Croatoan" carved on a tree and all his people gone. (The Lost Colony) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croatan
content.value:
The Croatan were a small Native American ethnic group living in the coastal areas of what is now North Carolina. Governor John White returned to Roanoke in 1590 to find the word "Croatoan" carved on a tree and all his people gone. (The Lost Colony)
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croatan
